Text.Page: Dougal asked you to investigate the argon raptor issue.

,

I need your help again. This time it's...well, you might only believe it if I can show you. Find me in Highwatch.

â€”Dougal

Good to see you again! Now, let's talk raptors.

Yes, raptors! And not just any raptors. Argon raptors.

I could give you a long preamble about why I need you to clear them out, but I think the phrase "argon raptors" more or less explains it, don't you?

Great work, as always. Thank you, .

Please take this reward on behalf of the federation.
